smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'AudioService' with '22' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: service cannot be safely cast to AudioService.OmBinder.
source.readValue(Int::class.java.classLoader) cannot be safely cast to Int?.
source.readValue(Int::class.java.classLoader) cannot be safely cast to Int?.
savedState cannot be safely cast to InternalState.
source.readValue(Int::class.java.classLoader) cannot be safely cast to Int?.
source.readValue(Int::class.java.classLoader) cannot be safely cast to Int?.
source.readValue(Int::class.java.classLoader) cannot be safely cast to Int?.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MeditationDetailActivity.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (service as AudioService.OmBinder) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: service as AudioService.OmBinder

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
